verses.verse: (God’s Work in Creation and in History) (2 Chr 20.21) O give thanks to the LORD, for he is good, for his steadfast love endures forever.
(Deut 10.17) O give thanks to the God of gods, for his steadfast love endures forever.
O give thanks to the Lord of lords, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ps 72.18) who alone does great wonders, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Gen 1.1; Jer 51.15) who by understanding made the heavens, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Gen 1.9; Jer 10.12) who spread out the earth on the waters, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Gen 1.14, 16) who made the great lights, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Gen 1.16) the sun to rule over the day, for his steadfast love endures forever;
the moon and stars to rule over the night, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 12.29; Ps 135.8) who struck Egypt through their firstborn, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 12.51) and brought Israel out from among them, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 6.6; Deut 4.34) with a strong hand and an outstretched arm, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 14.21; Ps 78.13) who divided the Red Sea (Or Sea of Reeds) in two, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 14.22) and made Israel pass through the midst of it, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ex 14.27; Ps 135.9) but overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, (Or Sea of Reeds) for his steadfast love endures forever;

(Ex 13.18; Deut 8.15) who led his people through the wilderness, for his steadfast love endures forever; who made water flow from the rock, for his steadfast love endures forever; (Gk: Heb lacks who made water…forever)
(Ps 135.10-12) who struck down great kings, for his steadfast love endures forever;
and killed famous kings, for his steadfast love endures forever;
Sihon, king of the Amorites, for his steadfast love endures forever;
and Og, king of Bashan, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Josh 12.1) and gave their land as a heritage, for his steadfast love endures forever;
a heritage to his servant Israel, for his steadfast love endures forever.
(Ps 113.7) It is he who remembered us in our low estate, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ps 107.2) and rescued us from our foes, for his steadfast love endures forever;
(Ps 104.27; 145.15) who gives food to all flesh, for his steadfast love endures forever.
O give thanks to the God of heaven, for his steadfast love endures forever.
